name: Cosmic Blvd
description:
Cosmic Blvd was a team project by Dom Calderon, Zsade Fleming, and Devon Mosier as part of Code Coven's Intro to Game Making 2021 course. The whole thing came together in about a week and we are incredibly proud of what we made.

Based on the randomly-generated theme "highway, secrets, home" we decided to make a game similar to Pokemon Snap where the player takes pictures of the strange creatures they see after taking a wrong turn going home. Players can view up to 8 photos they took along the ride when they finish the game.
